meanings.definition: Make (a difficult or esoteric subject) clearer and easier to understand.
meanings.sent1: The teacher demystifies complex math problems for the students.
meanings.sent2: She always demystifies scientific concepts in a fun way.
meanings.sent3: His magic trick demystifies the illusion of disappearing objects.
meanings.sent4: The documentary demystifies the life of famous artists.
meanings.sent5: The book demystifies the secrets of successful gardening.

meanings.sent1: The detective demystifies the crime scene to find clues.
meanings.sent2: The article demystifies the myths surrounding ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The magician demystifies his tricks by revealing the hidden mechanisms.
meanings.sent4: The scientist demystifies the supernatural phenomena with logical explanations.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide demystifies the history of the haunted house.
